mdRecord.dcterms:title: Memorandum and sketch, greenhouse and quarters, 1785
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, George, 1732-1799
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Memorandum notes that Quarters to be 16' wide; half of that with 4' projection sufficient width for greenhouse; chimneys and where to place them; in front part of greenhouse need 2 tiers of windows; windows close together; chimneys in quarters; front of quarters might be wood with brick underpinning--center or greenhouse part all brick to the eves; rafters same angle; describes how to place windows in greenhouse. Autograph document, silked, 2 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (VA. : Estate)
Greenhouse slave quarters
